rules_text:
[i]Grandeur[/i] – Discard another card named Expanding Ooze: Put a +1/+1 counter on Expanding Ooze.
Dredge 3 [i](If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)[/i]
notes:
Inspiration — Alien Goo

Mechanical Uniqueness — Grandeur + Dredge, Grandeur + Mindless Masses
